Chicken/nn-tl Cadillac/np-tl

	Add/vb enough/ap warmed/vbn cream/nn ,/, seasoned/vbn to/in taste/nn with/in onion/nn juice/nn ,/, to/in about/rp half/rb cover/vb the/at chicken/nn breasts/nns ./.
